section.title: Exporting environment variables
section.para: To run the cURL requests shown in this guide, export your tenant ID and the token that you got during authentication (see “Authenticate through the Rackspace Cloud Identity Service”) to environment variables and then copy the example from this guide to build a cURL command using API operation and the command line, script, or tool, changing URI parameters or body parameters as needed.

To export environment variables:
Export your tenant ID to the account environment variable: $ export account="tenantID"
Where tenantID is your account ID.
Export your authentication token to the token environment variable: $ export token="token_id"
Where token_id is the authentication token value in the id field of the token element in the authentication response. For information about finding the token ID, see “Authentication Response”.
